title: Terra Classic Community Votes to Stop USTC Minting as Revival Efforts Continue
description: TerraUSD Classic, the stablecoin at the center of Terra’s implosion, will no longer be minted.

title: Amazon invests $4B in OpenAI alumni Anthropic, launching AI cloud war with Microsoft and Google
description:
Amazon has reportedly agreed to invest up to $4 billion in Anthropic, an artificial intelligence startup, as the e-commerce giant ramps up competition with Microsoft, Meta, Google, and Nvidia in the burgeoning AI sector. According to TechCrunch, the massive investment underscores Amazon’s aggressive expansion into generative AI. Initially, Amazon will inject $1.25 billion for a […]

The post Amazon invests $4B in OpenAI alumni Anthropic, launching AI cloud war with Microsoft and Google appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Polygon-Powered Tokeny Facilitates €5 Million Green Bond for ABN Amro
description: ABN Amro has tapped into the power of Polygon’s Tokeny to issue digital green bonds. This is evident most financial giants are embracing blockchain innovations to advance their offerings. Amsterdam-headquartered bank ABN Amro is one the latest financial institutions that has leveraged Polygon’s Layer-2 Ethereum scaling technology. The Dutch Bank registered a digital green bond [...]

title: Vitalik Buterin Doesn’t Like Re-staking. Here’s why
description:
Re-staking has been one of the recent developments in Ethereum, taking center stage. And the core idea behind this trend is: When you can rent a security system, why create your own? Re-staking is a process where ETH tokens that are “staked” on Ethereum can be reused for smaller applications and networks. In this article, […]

The post Vitalik Buterin Doesn’t Like Re-staking. Here’s why appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: 3 Coins That Gained the Most in September’s 3rd Week
description:
